holidays.origin: Started in 1973 as a response to conflict, World Hello Day encourages dialogue to solve problems instead of violence.
holidays.funFact: World Hello Day was created in response to the Yom Kippur War, promoting greetings instead of gunfire.

holidays.origin: An unofficial day to poke fun at the concept of false confessions and encourage playful honesty.
holidays.funFact: Though most false confessions in real life are serious, this day invites only harmless, ridiculous admissions (like 'I ate the last cookie').

holidays.name: Have a Party with Your Bear Day
holidays.description: Honor your teddy bear or favorite stuffed companion by throwing a mini party just for them!
holidays.origin: An informal day to celebrate childhood comfort objects and spread joy.
holidays.funFact: Teddy bears have been cherished companions since the early 1900s and can reduce stress just by hugging!
